Container.Name: Coming Soon
Container.Overview: This is a Python script for generating a "Coming Soon" pre-roll using iCAL data from Radarr or Sonarr.
Container.Category: MediaApp:Video MediaServer:Video Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: schedule ical sonarr radarr plex jellyfin emby coming soon poster python

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Cron schedule for when to run the script.

Config.Name: Template - Video File
Config.Description: A video file that the text will be overlaid onto. This file must exist in the Config Path directory.

Config.Name: Template - Font File
Config.Description: A font file that the text will be overlaid onto. This file must exist in the Config Path directory. Remove this to use the default font (Arial).

Config.Name: Template - Font Size
Config.Description: Font size of the text overlay.

Config.Name: Template - Font Color
Config.Description: Font color of the text overlay. Allowed values: https://ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg-utils.html#color-syntax

Config.Name: Template - Text Location (X)
Config.Description: X coordinate of the top-left-most pixel for the text overlay.

Config.Name: Template - Text Location (Y)
Config.Description: Y coordinate of the top-left-most pixel for the text overlay.

Config.Name: Template - Center Text
Config.Description: Center the text overlay on the screen. Will override X and Y positions.

Config.Name: Template - Line Spacing
Config.Description: Line spacing of the text overlay.

Config.Name: Template - Text Start Time
Config.Description: How many seconds into the video to start the text overlay.

Config.Name: Template - Text End Time
Config.Description: How many seconds into the video to end the text overlay.

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to the config directory. This is where the script will look for the input file.

Config.Name: Output Path
Config.Description: Path to the output directory. This is where the generated video will be saved.
